UK Total monthly air passengers	
Paper:	
	Grubb, H. and Mason, A. (2001)
	Long lead-time forecasting of UK air passengers by Holt-Winters methods with damped trend
	International Journal of Forecasting, 17, 71-82.
Sources:	
1949-67	Summary of Activity at Aerodromes
	Table 4: Passengers Handled - Scheduled and Charter flights
	All Operators, Terminal
	Jan 49 - Aug 53: M.C.A. (Ministry of Civil Aviation) and other UK Aerodromes
	Sept 53 - Sept 59: M.T.C.A. (Ministry of Transport and Civil Aviation) and other UK Aerodromes
	Oct 59 - Aug 66: M.O.A. (Ministry of Aviation) and other UK Aerodromes
	Sept 66 - Dec 67: B.O.T. (Board of Trade) and other UK Aerodromes
1968-72	Business Monitor, Civil Aviation Series, CA2 Air Passengers, Table 1
1973-90	CAA Monthly Airport Statistics (figures taken from following year's book, in order to catch updates)
1991 onwards	Produced by CAA Airports Statistics System
Contact:	
Howard Grubb	Department of Applied Statistics
	The University of Reading
	PO Box 240, READING, RG6 6FN, UK
	H.J.Grubb@reading.ac.uk
	http://www.reading.ac.uk/~snsgrubb
Alexina Mason	National Air Traffic Services Ltd
	CAA House, 45-59 Kingsway
	LONDON WC2B 6TE
